abstract:
Problems of the developing e-learning materials based on practical approach are considered in this paper. Practical approach is demonstrated by developing learning materials for the text book on Computer Sciences, particularly, programming on C. This approach implies two aspects: introducing new definition, object or structure through considering some practical problem example and elaborating problems reflecting practice application.
Key words: e-learning, C programming, practical approach.
meta: Project: Development of web-based Quality Assurance Learning Management System
